summary: This is my personal Uthgerd revisitation.
descriptionHtml:
[b][center]
[font=Times New Roman][size=4]Uthgerd l'Indomita[/size][/font][/center][/b]

     This is my personal revisitation about Uthgerd The Unbroken (Uthgerd l'Indomita)
     The idea in behind this mod is to keep the spirit of the Nord Women but with less ugly face, without loosing the 
﻿idea of a real fighter, and that's why the scars.
 
     It [b][i][color=green]should[/color][/i][/b] be Italian so, I wonder why I'm typing in English but, anyway it [b][i][color=orange]could[/color][/i][/b] works fine in English version too...

     This mod didn't use any kind of custom models (but the face) or textures, so it is compatible with every kind mods:
            hairs, texture replacement, eyes, etc...etc...

     If you wish to create an English or whatever language version, just keep me informed.
     
     No - you cannot share it on other websites.
     Yes - you can modify it but let me know it first.

Installation: 
     Copy on data folder :P
                                                                                Have Fun ^_^
                                                                                [font=Comic Sans MS][i]MaximilianPs[/i][/font]
author: MaximilianPs
